column3: â€œExcellent.  Switches your mood ... quickly.  A powerful high.  It's special and I wish I could buy it again.  Super cerebral.  There's a body high as well.â€

â€œI was a bit skeptical when I heard the name but within a few drags I could understand why it is called as such. It leaves a sort of fermented flavor in the mouth much like the aftertaste of a glass of sparkly. Sweet smelling and potent - the high hit me like a brick of euphoria and relaxation.â€

â€œThis strain was the smoothest I've ever smoked so far. I got to take gravities, and the first I got a nice chill high then the second I was just having a good time. All my stress was relieved. What I loved the most about this hybrid strain was I still had a sense of alertness and self-control. I was playing some GTA, and I drove great haha Just my mental and physical capabilities were all there. I did get some light ...â€

â€œMigraine pain comin on; nausea 4 when I medicated round 2130 or so. Takes bout 5 min to start working. Body high perfect. Head buzz heavy; perfect for insomnia. NO ANXIETY/PARANOIA (an absolute must for me). Takes sweet/berries. Omg, I want to go sleepies now....zzzzz.... highly recommend for late evening/before bed use for pain/nausea.â€

â€œReally enjoyed the last batch of this I tried. Very lovely light green nugs with just oodles of hairs. The scent is kind of a lovely cheese funky smell to me but the taste is tingly on your tongue and nose, just like sippin' champagne. Or at least some champipple. For me this was a 50/50 hybrid kind of pain relief and cerebral effects but not at all overwhelming. Better for day use than night use in my experience. Bu...â€
â€œListening to Champagne High"by Sister Hazel and smoking this great tasting strain

â€œNot hard on the lungs. Doesn't make you feel paranoid or sleepy. Makes you think about yourself more not the outside world. Good for meditation, relaxing on your own. It seems when you come down, it makes you really hungry.â€
â€œSmells great, light and crisp sensation. Awesome as a daily med, however the effect does not last long.â€
â€œSmells great, light and crisp sensation. Awesome as a daily med, however the effect does not last long.â€

â€œI am unable to smoke, so this review is for a tincture made from 1 oz of Champagne Kush:

Used 190 proof neutral spirits - 375 ml
1 oz oven-dried cannabis (ground)
1 Mason jar with tight-fitting lid

I let the mixture sit in the refrigerator for 1 week, turning at least 4 times a day. The mixture formed 3 layers. The top layer was a rich, deep turquoise green and gave a total body high. The onset was within 30 ...â€

â€œVery sweet aromatic smell, and you do get that sweet bitter taste of champagne when you exhale. The light buzz starts from your temples down to your toes. Euphoria is very common. You feel focused and aware but still relaxed from the sativa effect. Not a heavy hitter but a beautiful sativa that smells and looks great!â€

â€œOh wowilicouis !  Champagne Kush is one of the most up, up, UP !  Sativa-dominated strains that I have had in all my considerable life au Quebec !   I know a few great Sativa's,  but some I would gladly trade for more of this Euphoric Kush.  She was one of the very first 100% Organic strains and she was not a typical Kush ou's was a nine foot Goddess of the others in the garden.  She was quite long to finish, but not...â€
â€œGood marijuana but there is definitely something lacking but I can't put my tongue to it.â€

â€œI don't know what to think about this strain I really enjoy it but it says it's Indica but every time I smoke it I work graveyard right before work it seems to get me a pretty high lift electricity though and I don't know why it is OK takes my pain away and puts me in a really good mood I have a broken femur like I have said in previous reviews so it does the trick if you guys want this for I would say just a head ru...â€

â€œI got a couple ounces of this delicious stuff and smoked it in my Volcano Vaporizer. It was dry as nun's cunt and grinded into a fine pixie dust...Needless to say this shit  effs you up in a good way.  I've attached a nice high resolution image of the Champagne Kush I had bubbling.â€

I also wasn't too hungry. The munchies never kicked in. I plan on trying to...â€

column3: â€œThis sativa raped my mind. Music was a trip and a half, driving in circles in a parking lot caused my vision to continue to go in circles even after getting out of the car, strobelighting (vision) occurred, none of us could stop smiling, our eyes were little red slits, I was super disoriented and dizzy, and unable to do anything social. I went back to my bed and lay there looking at my lights and thinking a million t...â€

â€œAmazing stuff. This is a new strain for me and one I will surely try again. When I asked the girl at SBC what she liked, she immediately picked this up.

At first glance the color didn't impress me but when I looked closer the image resolved into a golden-green trichome covered thing of beauty. The entire 8th was, I kid you not, one giant nug jammed into one of the camera-film 8th bottles, so not dense at all. Pretty...â€

â€œone of those â€œwith enough consumptionâ€ buds, looks good, smells ok, not too pungent, high is ok, but instead of 2 bowl packs i need about 4-5 to get me off my rocker (how i usually like to be)
as far as taste goes, it doesnt taste like anything or is it just me? i hit it out of papers, a clean bong, & a bowl, even used a hemp wick.â€

â€œSplit an 1/8 of this with my boyfriend over the course of a week. Just looking at it you can tell it's going to be a good strain. Super dense, sticky, and the smell was amazing. Quick to get you high, easily can make you stoned if you take too many hits. Makes you want to sit on the couch and talk and mellow out. This strain doesn't make me sleepy or groggy (as long as it's taken easily, especially for new smokers), ...â€

â€œI recently copped an 8th of this and the nugs are nice and big, not too dense. Smooth flavor, and the smell wasn't very pungent. It didn't linger on clothes or in my car for too long. â€œSmooth, clean smoke with a mellow high. Helpful for body/nerve pain in a mild numbing way. Real easy, go with the flow type of effect, best for when nothing in particular needs to get down, as it makes you get stuck for random periods of time. Euphoric and Uplifting, for sure! Definitely recommend!â€

â€œI don't remember what my pain/nausea scale was as this was yesterday; round 2030 or so. Takes bout 5-10 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. Gonna hafta try it again to decide that. Highly recommend for (@ the least) evening use! :-)â€

â€œBlue Roots Cannabis Co. 21% THC 70/30 Indica/Sativa hybrid. 
Flower: big gorgeous cones covered in long wispy orange hairs. 
Smell: very fruity and fresh. 
Crumble: ground up nice and fluffy. 
Taste: Sweet and kushy with lemon and citrus flavors. 
High: I had a numb feeling in my face and relaxation in my body. Giggly. Made me sleepy on the come down. 
Overall Experience: 8.75/10â€
